articles.content: (Gray News) - Employers can require its workers to receive a COVID-19 vaccine and exclude them from the workplace if they refuse, the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission said in guidelines issued… [+1354 chars]

articles.title: Vaccinations at Chicago-area hospital to resume after 4 workers experience adverse reactions - FOX 29 News Philadelphia
articles.description: A north suburban hospital is temporarily pausing coronavirus vaccinations after four workers reported feeling adverse reactions.
articles.content:
